hero.description: We believe in meaningful, two-way communication. That’s why every consultation is conducted directly and tailored to your needs. A fast and timely response is our way of showing that your time matters.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete language solutions for your needs

translation.title: Translation
translation.description: Language differences often hinder the fusion of outstanding ideas. SAE is ready to bridge your ideas to travel the world with our accurate and fast translation service. We have translated various documents, such as journal articles, final papers, questionnaires, guide books, manual books, PowerPoint presentations, and company profiles. Rest assured that your documents are kept secret and translated by more than nine-year-old experienced linguists.

proofreading.title: Proofreading
proofreading.description: Good writing must be good-written. SAE ensures your manuscript is error-free literally through our proofreading services. Professional linguists carry out this service by entirely scrutinizing every detail: typing, cohesion, coherence, and diction. We issue proofreading certificates for journal publication requirements.

swornTranslation.title: Sworn Translation
swornTranslation.description: Struggling to find a reliable sworn translator? SAE has got you covered. From KTP (ID card), KK (Family Register), and Akta (Deed) to transcripts and certificates, SAE’s sworn translation service delivers accurate results complete with a stamp, reference number, and official letterhead.

transcription.title: Transcription
transcription.description: SAE’s transcription supports your audio to be heard better, reach a broader audience, essential for accessibility, ease search and analysis, as well as enhancing SEO.

captionInstagram.title: Instagram Captions
captionInstagram.description: Every photo and video has stories worth telling. Share your thoughts behind the visual through our Instagram Caption services.

englishCourse.title: English Course
englishCourse.description: Mastering English means you can connect knowledge and relations from around the world. Our experienced tutors have taught students from young age to college and job seekers. We’re also graduates of Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs linear to the fields. Our English class is customizable with your tight schedule and chosen materials.

bipaClass.title: BIPA Class
bipaClass.description: Our BIPA (Bahasa Indonesia for Non-Native Speakers) class is customizable with your tight schedule and chosen materials. We use various media to learn, so you can have all aspects needed to master bahasa Indonesia: reading, listening, writing, and speaking. Bonus: you’ll get to know Indonesian culture along the way!

subtitling.title: Subtitling
subtitling.description: Level up your video quality with our subtitling service. Subtitle is beyond a clearer hearing, it reaches broader audiences and understanding when the audio is too fast or involving certain dialects and accent.

typing.title: Typing
typing.description: Having documents in a form of photo or scan that aren’t detectable? Feel free to contact us and get our typing service affordably and fast. Stress-free life is coming!

formatting.title: Formatting
formatting.description: You deserve a well-rested day after a long journey crafting your work of words. Send the rest of the process to us: formatting. SAE can follow the format guide from your chosen journal or university. We’ve put our magic hands to mostly academic documents such as undergraduate thesis, thesis, dissertation, and journal article.

pptLayouting.title: PPT Layouting
pptLayouting.description: Deliver your brilliant ideas with supporting media. SAE guarantees your presentation layout is more engaging, moving, and pleasing to the eye. The design follows your taste whilst still aligning with the contents.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: If you have any questions, we are here to answer them all.

items.question: What services does SAE provide?
items.answer:
SAE offers complete services in writing and language learning.

Writing services include:
- Document translation
- Sworn translation
- Proofreading & editing
- Audio/video transcription
- Subtitling & captioning
- Instagram captions
- Typing and data entry
- Document formatting
- PowerPoint layout design

Language learning includes:
- English courses
- BIPA classes (Indonesian for Foreigners)

items.question: Will my documents remain confidential?
items.answer: Yes, your privacy is our top priority. All documents are kept confidential and deleted after completion.

items.question: How long does it take to complete my document?
items.answer:
The turnaround time depends on the service and package:
- Regular: up to 5,000 words/day
- Express: up to 7,000 words/day
- Legal documents (sworn translation): 2–3 working days

items.question: How do I send documents for translation?
items.answer: Please contact us via WhatsApp at 082137903311.

items.question: Can I request revisions if the result is unsatisfactory?
items.answer: Yes. We offer unlimited revisions for translation errors, but not for content changes.

items.question: Can you translate official documents like diplomas or certificates?
items.answer: Yes, our sworn translation service covers official documents such as diplomas, certificates, and legal papers.

items.question: Can I consult before ordering a service?
items.answer: Absolutely. Feel free to contact us via WhatsApp at 082137903311 for a free consultation.

consultNow.heading: Ready to Make Your Writing More Meaningful?
consultNow.description: Consult your needs now and experience a personalized and timely service. We're here to help you write better — from start to finish.

reasons.title: High Accuracy & Quality

detail.heading: Find professional linguists with fast response
detail.description: All our linguists are native speakers who translate into their mother tongue and reside in their home countries. Each linguist is highly qualified in the field of translation.

heroAbout.title: About Us
heroAbout.description: SAE is the right place to meet all your writing needs. We call it a "home" because here you don't just fill out a form—you can also directly discuss with our linguists. We value your time by providing fast responses and delivering work on time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Consult your project with us so we can handle it with the right approach.
